code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CityForm(_ref){let{onAddCity,onFetchWeather}=_ref;const[city,setCity]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(city.trim()){onAddCity(city);setCity('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"city-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:city,onChange:e=>setCity(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter city name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add City"})]});}export default CityForm;
